name: Daddys Easter Egg Hunt!
description:
A simple 3D game I made by myself, for Godot Wild Jam 20.

Keyboard controls:

  • Move: WASD
  • Rotate camera:  Left and right arrows
  • Roll: Space
  • Use/Interact: E
  • Pause: Escape
  • Fullscreen: Tab

Gamepad (Xbox) controls:

  • Move: Left analog stick
  • Rotate camera:  LB and RB
  • Roll: X
  • Use/Interact: B
  • Pause: Start
  • Fullscreen: Select

Assets I made:

  • Maps are made in Trenchbroom. Imported with Qodot addon.
  • 3D models made in blender by me.
  • Most of the textures and UI made in Gimp and Aseprite by me.

Assets I did not make:

  • Particle textures: Bought from Kenney
  • Font: Slapface, bought from https://chevyray.itch.io/pixel-fonts
  • SFX: Various free assets (not made by me).
  • Music: “Color Blocks”, from PlayOnLoop.com Licensed under Creative Commons by Attribution 4.0
